trans-unit.source: How to: Create a Tree from an XmlReader (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Como: criar uma árvore de um XmlReader (Visual Basic) | Documentos do Microsoft

trans-unit.source: How to: Create a Tree from an XmlReader (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Como: criar uma árvore de um XmlReader (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to create an XML tree directly from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico mostra como criar uma árvore XML diretamente de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: To create an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, you must position the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> on an element node.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, você deve posicionar o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>em um nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> will skip comments and processing instructions, but if the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned on a text node, an error will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>ignorará comentários e instruções de processamento, mas se o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>é posicionado em um nó de texto, um erro será gerado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: To avoid such errors, always position the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> on an element before you create an XML tree from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar esses erros, sempre posicione o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>em um elemento antes de criar uma árvore XML de <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This example uses the following XML document: [Sample XML File: Books (LINQ to XML)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/sample-xml-file-books-linq-to-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo usa o seguinte documento XML: [arquivo XML de exemplo: livros (LINQ to XML)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/sample-xml-file-books-linq-to-xml.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code creates an `T:System.Xml.XmlReader` object, and then reads nodes until it finds the first element node.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir cria um objeto `T:System.Xml.XmlReader` e depois lê os nós até encontrar o primeiro nó do elemento.

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo gera a seguinte saída:
